column3: Concept ACK.\nBut should it be `build directory containing bitcoind/bitcoin-cli`? After out-of-tree builds, there is no guarantee that the executables will be where the source is.\n

I only intended to change the default path for the default build setup. Its just annoying entering `--srcdir=src` all the time. IMO its more convenient to execute the test script from the root build dir instead from the `qa/rpc-tests` dir (which the current default path is referring to). \n
I agree, just thought maybe we can change the help message at the same time. But not necessary here.\n

This is indeed a simple and uncontroversial improvement. Using BUILDDIR requires some refactoring, which can be done in a later pull.
